net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.dnd

Interface DragSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ResourceDragSource, SimpleDragSource

    public interface DragSource
    The source of a drag and drop operation. An instance is used as an argument to the ComponentImpl.setDragSource(DragSource) method to enable the drag source. Drag and drop will automatically be enabled if at least one component with a drag source and at least one other component with a drop target are shown (see Component.isShown().
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Transferable getTransferable()
      Get the data for this source.
      Collection<ContentType> getTransferContentTypes()
      Get the supported content types for this source.

    • Method Detail

      • getTransferable

        Transferable getTransferable()
        Get the data for this source. This method will be called in response to a drag and drop operation and will exist only for the lifetime of a single operation.
        Returns:
        Transferable.

      • getTransferContentTypes

        Collection<ContentType> getTransferContentTypes()
        Get the supported content types for this source. This transferable returned by this source must return a super set of these values. This method may be called many times in a short period of time and should be efficient.
        Returns:
        Collection of ContentType, may be empty.
